title: Infectious Disease Monitoring & Analytics Platform
description: Full-stack epidemiological surveillance system with real-time disease tracking, geospatial visualization, and predictive modeling for public health decision-making.
longDescription:
A comprehensive healthcare platform built to monitor and analyze infectious disease outbreaks in real-time. The system provides epidemiologists and health administrators with powerful tools for case management, statistical analysis, and outbreak prediction.

Features include interactive geospatial mapping, temporal trend analysis, and SIR/SEIR epidemiological modeling for disease spread simulation. The platform separates public health data visualization from administrative controls, ensuring data privacy while maintaining transparency.

Built with modern scalable architecture using NestJS microservices, PostgreSQL for robust data persistence, and React-based dashboards for intuitive user experience.
features: Real-time disease case tracking and management
Interactive geospatial heat maps and location markers
Advanced statistical analytics and trend visualization
Epidemiological modeling (SIR/SEIR) for outbreak prediction
Role-based access control (Admin/Public interfaces)
Temporal data analysis with configurable time intervals
Multi-location disease distribution monitoring
JWT-secured API with comprehensive data validation

title: SpeedTest Pro - Internet Speed Testing Platform
description: A modern full-stack speed test application that measures internet performance with real-time testing, user authentication, interactive maps, and comprehensive analytics dashboard.
longDescription:
SpeedTest Pro is a sophisticated web application built for comprehensive internet speed testing and performance monitoring. The project implements a robust client-server architecture with an interactive React/TypeScript frontend and a scalable Node.js backend.

It utilizes advanced speed measurement algorithms based on Cloudflare's API to deliver precise results for download, upload, latency, and jitter metrics. The application features a complete authentication system with JWT tokens, MongoDB data persistence, and geolocation capabilities for displaying results on an interactive map of Romania.

The user interface is modern and intuitive, featuring futuristic visual elements, interactive charts, and an optimized UX for all device types. This project demonstrates advanced full-stack development skills, Redux state management, external API integration, and implementation of complex networking and data visualization functionalities.
features: Real-time internet speed testing with download/upload measurements
Interactive map visualization with speed test results across Romania
User authentication system with JWT and secure password management
Personal test history with statistical charts and analytics
Top cities ranking by average internet speed
Responsive modern UI with futuristic design elements
Latency and jitter quality measurements
Geolocation-based automatic location detection
RESTful API with robust error handling
Redux state management with data persistence

title: Full-Stack Social Media Platform
description: A complete social networking application with real-time interactions, user authentication, and modern responsive design built with React and Node.js.
longDescription:
A comprehensive social media platform that replicates core functionalities of modern social networks. The application features secure user authentication, real-time post interactions, friend management system, and image uploads.

Built with a scalable MERN stack architecture, it demonstrates proficiency in full-stack development, RESTful API design, state management, and modern UI/UX principles.

The platform includes responsive design with dark/light theme switching, JWT-based authentication, and optimized database operations for seamless user experience.
features: Secure user authentication and registration with JWT tokens
Real-time social feed with post creation and image uploads
Interactive like and comment system for posts
Friend management system with add/remove functionality
Responsive user profiles with personal information display
Dark/Light theme switching for enhanced user experience
RESTful API design with protected routes and middleware
Optimized state management using Redux for seamless data flow

title: Invoice Management System
description: Full-stack web application for automated invoice generation and client management with PDF export capabilities
longDescription:
A comprehensive invoice management solution built for Romanian businesses, featuring automated invoice generation, client management, and financial reporting. The application streamlines the entire invoicing workflow from client registration to PDF generation, with real-time calculations for VAT, totals, and tax handling.

Users can manage multiple clients, track invoice status (issued/collected), generate professional PDF invoices, and access detailed financial reports.

The system includes user authentication, role-based access, and a modern responsive interface optimized for business workflows.
features: Automated invoice generation with PDF export
Complete client management system (CRUD operations)
Real-time VAT and total calculations
Invoice status tracking (issued/collected)
Advanced search and filtering capabilities
Financial reporting and analytics dashboard
JWT-based secure authentication
Responsive modern UI with pagination

title: E-commerce Platform with Headless CMS
description: Modern e-commerce application built with Next.js and Sanity CMS, featuring real-time inventory management, Stripe payment integration, and responsive design for seamless shopping experiences.
longDescription:
A comprehensive e-commerce solution that demonstrates full-stack development capabilities with modern web technologies. The application features a decoupled architecture using Sanity as a headless CMS for content management, Next.js for the frontend with server-side rendering for optimal SEO performance, and Stripe for secure payment processing.

The platform includes dynamic product pages, real-time shopping cart functionality with global state management, and a complete admin panel for inventory management.

Built with scalability in mind, it showcases advanced React patterns, API integration, and modern development practices suitable for production environments.
features: Headless CMS integration with Sanity for dynamic content management
Server-side rendering and static generation for optimal SEO performance
Real-time shopping cart with persistent state management using React Context
Secure payment processing with Stripe Checkout integration
Dynamic product pages with image galleries and detailed views
Responsive design optimized for desktop and mobile devices
Admin dashboard for product and banner management
Toast notifications and loading states for enhanced user experience

title: PharmaPlus E-Commerce Platform
description: A comprehensive pharmaceutical e-commerce platform built with NestJS, featuring advanced inventory management, multi-courier integration, automated billing, and secure payment processing for online pharmacy operations.
longDescription:
PharmaPlus is a robust, enterprise-grade e-commerce solution specifically designed for pharmaceutical retail. The platform handles complex pharmacy requirements including prescription validation, OTC product management, expiration date tracking, and regulatory compliance.

Built with modern microservices architecture, it integrates seamlessly with external systems like BizPharma for inventory synchronization, Netopia for secure payments, and multiple courier services (Urgent Cargus, Sameday) for reliable delivery.

The system features automated invoice generation, email notifications, promotional campaigns, and a comprehensive admin dashboard for order management. With JWT authentication, Google OAuth integration, and role-based access control, it ensures secure operations while providing an intuitive user experience for both customers and administrators.
features: Advanced Product Management with OTC/Prescription categorization
Multi-Courier Integration (Urgent Cargus, Sameday) with AWB generation
Automated Invoice Generation and Email Notifications
Real-time Inventory Synchronization with BizPharma
Secure Payment Processing via Netopia Gateway
Comprehensive Order Management with Status Tracking
Blog CMS with Categories and Comment System
Promotional Campaigns and Gift Product Management

title: ECOMVISION - Advanced E-commerce Admin Dashboard
description: A comprehensive full-stack admin dashboard built with MERN stack, featuring real-time analytics, interactive data visualizations, and complete e-commerce management capabilities.
longDescription:
ECOMVISION is a sophisticated business intelligence dashboard designed for e-commerce platforms, providing administrators with powerful tools to monitor and analyze business performance. The application features a modern, responsive interface built with React and Material-UI, offering real-time insights through interactive charts, geographical data visualization, and comprehensive reporting systems.

The backend leverages Node.js and Express to deliver robust API endpoints, while MongoDB ensures efficient data management.

The dashboard includes advanced features like multi-role user management, transaction tracking, product analytics, and performance monitoring, making it an essential tool for data-driven decision making in e-commerce operations.
features: Real-time business analytics dashboard with KPI tracking
Interactive data visualizations using Nivo charts (bar, line, pie, geographic)
Advanced data grid with sorting, filtering, and pagination capabilities
Geographic user distribution mapping with country-based analytics
Multi-role user management system (user, admin, superadmin)
Comprehensive product management with sales statistics and inventory tracking
Transaction monitoring with search and export functionality
Dark/Light theme switching with responsive design for all devices

title: VCRM - Management System
description: Enterprise-grade workforce management platform for construction and technical services companies, featuring real-time project tracking, team coordination, and automated billing workflows.
longDescription:
A comprehensive backend system built with NestJS that streamlines operations for service-based companies managing multiple teams, vehicles, equipment, and complex projects. The platform handles the complete project lifecycle from client acquisition and contract management to work execution, time tracking, and automated invoicing.

Features include GPS-based job locations, multi-level approval workflows, real-time notifications via SMS/Email, document management with cloud storage, and role-based access control for different organizational levels.

The system supports subcontractor coordination, equipment allocation, vehicle fleet management, and detailed work entry tracking with team lead and admin approval processes.
features: Multi-role user management with hierarchical permissions (SuperAdmin, Admin, TeamLead, Employee)
Complex project workflow management with 9 distinct status stages from confirmation to billing
GPS-based job location tracking with geofencing capabilities
Real-time work entry tracking with dual-level approval system
Automated notification system via SMS and Email with HTML templates
Cloud-based document management supporting multiple file formats
Fleet and equipment management with user assignment tracking
Integrated CRM with client management, contracts, and subcontractor coordination

title: Bolt Relay - Amazon Relay Autobooker Chrome Extension
description: Advanced Chrome extension with automated booking system for Amazon Relay transportation marketplace using API interception and real-time monitoring.
longDescription:
A sophisticated Chrome extension that automates the booking process on Amazon Relay's transportation marketplace. The system intercepts API calls, processes real-time freight opportunities, and automatically reserves the most profitable loads based on user-defined criteria.

Features include JWT authentication, multi-language support, real-time price monitoring, and both manual and automatic booking modes.

Built with TypeScript and modern web technologies, the extension integrates seamlessly with Amazon Relay's interface while providing advanced filtering and booking capabilities for transportation companies.
features: Real-time API interception and network request modification
Automated freight booking with customizable criteria and filters
JWT-based authentication system with session management
Multi-language support (Romanian, English, French, Dutch)
Real-time price monitoring and opportunity tracking
Progressive 4-step workflow with user guidance
Audio notifications and visual feedback system
Advanced data processing for location and equipment categorization

title: BoltRelay Autobooker Web Page- Amazon Relay Load Automation Platform
description: Enterprise-grade SaaS platform enabling truck drivers to automate Amazon Relay load bookings with intelligent algorithms, real-time optimization, and comprehensive subscription management.
longDescription:
BoltRelay is a sophisticated full-stack web application that revolutionizes the transportation industry by automating Amazon Relay load bookings for truck drivers and logistics companies. Built with modern technologies and enterprise-grade architecture, the platform features intelligent booking algorithms that work 24/7 to secure the most profitable loads, comprehensive user management with multi-tier subscription plans, and seamless payment processing through Stripe integration.

The application supports multiple languages, implements GDPR-compliant data protection, and provides real-time monitoring capabilities.

With its responsive design and intuitive UX, BoltRelay serves as both a marketing platform and a complete user dashboard, enabling drivers to optimize their operations and increase profitability by up to 40% while saving 90% of manual booking time.
features: Multi-tier SaaS subscription system with Stripe integration
JWT-based authentication with token validation and refresh
Internationalization support for 5 languages (EN, RO, ES, IT, FR)
GDPR-compliant cookie consent and data protection
Real-time user dashboard with subscription management
Responsive design with modern UI/UX patterns
Email verification and password reset workflows
SEO optimization with dynamic meta tags and sitemap generation
